description_for_human: Access Solana NFT data including floor prices, collections, and wallet analysis. Trade, list, and manage NFTs on Solana.
description_for_model: This plugin allows you to interact with the Solana NFT ecosystem. You can get floor prices, find trending collections, analyze wallet holdings, get NFT metadata, and even list/delist NFTs on marketplaces. Use this plugin when users ask about Solana NFTs, want to check collection statistics, or need to manage their NFT holdings.
